cpl.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/speech-synthesis
cpl.name: speech-synthesis
cpl.description: Web Speech synthesis (TTS), free and offline
cpl.readme:
It works completely offline.

!! Usage

```tw5
\define text-to-speak() Hello World

<$button>
  Speak Hello World
  <$speech-synthesis-widget text=<<text-to-speak>> />
</$button>
```
